title: Group Hypnosis Magnetic Circle Part 1 / Non-verbal hypnosis masterclass
description:
This is the non-verbal hypnosis masterclass of Dr. Paret. He and his students are creating a magnetic circle during group hypnosis exercise. Dr. Paret uses specific ASMR sounds and music and the students enter in a deep hypnotic trance state. Non-verbal hypnosis can connect us to our deepest self. See what happens in the next part of this video, when the hypnotic experience is stronger. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
